hello@otisvalen.com

This is

Otis Valen

I’m a digital designer who thrives on color chaos, joyful details, and ideas that make you tilt your head and grin. My work blends playful thinking with clean execution — whether it’s a brand, a website, or a weird little concept that shouldn’t work (but totally does). If it moves, clicks, scrolls, or shimmers — I’m into it.

Inside my head / slightly filtered

I design things that click — literally and emotionally. From bold brands to pixel-perfect websites, my work lives in the digital space where color, energy, and clever details come out to play. I'm not here to decorate; I'm here to connect.

Every project I take on is a sandbox — where ideas get messy, buttons have feelings, and layouts get personality. I like clean design with a wild side, smart systems that don’t take themselves too seriously, and interfaces that move like they mean it.

Otis Valen isn’t just a name — it’s a creative habit. I’ve spent the last few years building visual identities, interactive sites, and playful experiences for clients who love good design but aren’t afraid to have fun with it. If that sounds like you, let’s make cool stuff.

Interactive

Joyful

Precise

Curious

Personality

Room 404

3D Composition

//

Conceptual UI

Room 404 is a surreal interface study—built like a dream, styled like a glitch. Inspired by forgotten log-in screens, hotel lobbies in space, and retro-futurism at large, this project blends 3D visuals with UI elements that feel oddly familiar. It’s not functional. It’s not broken. It just... exists. Welcome in.

Scroll Down

Project 0001

What They Said After

“Otis didn’t just deliver a design — they delivered a whole experience. Every detail felt intentional, every color felt like it had a story. We came in with a vague idea and left with a brand that felt like it had its own personality. Also, they’re weirdly good at naming buttons.”

Juno Merrick

Director, WOW Studio

Collabs, or cosmic brainstorms welcome

Home
About
Projects
Awards
Contact

Damien

Tsara

Ntos

I develop websites and applications that evoke positive feelings

Web Designer

&

Front-end

Developer

*

I handle both web design and development, ensuring the final product aligns perfectly with my vision.


I also thrive in a team environment, where each member excels in their specialty and performs their role flawlessly.


I believe every website or service should be visually appealing and offer additional value to users.


My skills enable me to create complete websites, addressing all the client's needs.


I prefer collaborating with individuals who are passionate about their work and treat it as their lifelong endeavor.


Currently, I am working with the Emotion Agency team to develop digital products using this approach.


What

is

my

Feature?

Since 2018, I've discovered my passion for merging functional solutions with aesthetics, creating products that people love to use.

I utilize a wide range of tools to achieve optimal results. I enjoy working with 3D, photography, video, typography, colors, and unique graphic solutions.

Businesses should not only generate profit but also enrich lives: address real problems, inspire, and foster a sense of community.

Everything I do daily is focused on one goal – to infuse people's lives with visual and functional beauty.




The overall impression of a product is made up of the details to which we dedicate considerable time.




Elegant animations on a website or an intuitive interface that feels effortless – that's the essence of true aesthetics.

Development

Visit website

The primary objective is to create a landing page for LuxStamp with an online order form. The main goals of the site are lead generation and facilitating purchase orders.

The company operates in Ivano-Frankivsk and is expanding to new offices in Bakhmach, Novograd-Volynsky, and Kyiv.
